charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Kuriarare (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Kuriarare (S) was a member of the Seven Swordsmen of the Mist and a member of the Hidden Mist Village's Anbu. During his life he committed countless atrocities and he is happy to be back from death to engage his newfound opponents.

abilities.name: Silent Stiching
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Kuriarare (S) uses Silent Stitching on one enemy dealing 20 piercing damage.

abilities.name: Spider Sewing
abilities.description: Using Spider Sewing Edo Tensei Kuriarare (S) targets all enemies. Silent Stitching and Wire Crucifixion will deal 5 more damage to all targets of this skill permanently. Edo Tensei Kuriarare (S) gains 25% damage reduction for 1 turn when this skill is used. This skill ignores invulnerability and stacks.

abilities.name: Wire Crucifixion
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Kuriarare (S) uses Wire Crucifixion on one enemy dealing 15 damage. That enemy's physical and chakra skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Senbon Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Kuriarare (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
